name: Viscosa
description:
Description : 

Viscosa was a game made in 3 weeks with a team of 6 !

The goal was to upgrade our skills with a more difficult game

Crédits :

- Charlet Samuel, Game Programmer and Lead of the project

- Walenczak Simon, Game Programmer

- Aubart Adam, Game Artist 

- Antonio Manuel, Game Artist

- Gournay Victor, Game Artist

- Gontier Luc, Game Designer

- Derisquebourg Gaspard, Game Designer

- Cailles Jean-Charles, Game Designer

Thanks to our teachers Esteves Aurélien and Reynaert Vincent to help us during the project !

How to Play :

You have to use your mouse in the boat and press "Space" to open the map

In combat, use your mouse to choose an attack or else and use your keyboard to complete the sentences ! Faster your are, more damage you put !

The game doesn't have backup so when you leave, you lose your progression
